Text.val: For HttpGet we have Script#1. That we load and execute
- The name of the file wher it should write the response (body)

ExpSyntax.val: 'Failed to load script for template id#1'

Text.val: Script parameters we get in a vector from where we read them "as is"
and concatenate them to a single string prefixed with " --" which is what
scriptcs expects for parameters which go to the script (and not to scriptcs itself)
